this_title: Lule të kuqe, lule të zeza
introduction: 阿尔巴尼亚女导演Mevlan Shanaj的处女长片，是一部很不错的东欧当代女性题材剧。2004年纽约国际独立电影节最佳影片。Red Flowers, Black FlowersBy Mevlan ShanajAlbania 2003,105 min, English sub-titlesLiliana, a free spirited woman, is abandoned by her husband and so is her newly wed daughter Ana. As the village becomes emptier, foreign religion missionaries keep arriving. After her father and husband leave, Ana disappears. Liliana is left behind with the teacher, whom her husband always thought of as being Ana's father.Winner of Best Feature Film in the International Film Awards category during the New York International Independent Film and Video Festival that took place in November 2004 in New York City.A film about dramatic relations, love affairs, loneliness and nightmares in an abandoned Albanian village, where people live like satellites to one another, churches are like satellites to mosques, villages are like satellites to cities and where the grave has miscarried.
